content.text:
I'll help you explore this directory. Let me start by understanding the structure of the current working directory.

<tool_code>
<parameter=command>ls -la</parameter>
</tool_code>

Let me also check if there are any git-related files or configuration:

<tool_code>
<parameter=command>git status 2>&1 || echo "Not a git repository"</parameter>
</tool_code>

And check for any package.json or other configuration files that might indicate the project type:

<tool_code>
<parameter=command>find . -name "*.json" -o -name "*.config.*" -o -name "package.json" -o -name "requirements.txt" -o -name "*.md" | head -20</parameter>
</tool_code>

Let me also check for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files since this appears to be a web application directory:

<tool_code>
<parameter=command>find . -name "*.html" -o -name "*.css" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.vue" -o -name "*.ts" | wc -l</parameter>
</tool_code>
